title: Bakuto

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game or when you become a Bakuto, wager as many of these as you'd like:
1. Wager how many nights you believe it will be before a Yakuza member is attacked
2. Wager how many days it will be before a Yakuza member is voted out
3. Wager how many nights it will take before a Yakuza recruit converts to your faction
4. Wager how many days it will be before a town member is voted out

- For each wager you guessed correctly, you gain a charge of Destruction.
- Whenever a wager is incorrect (ie: You wagered that a yakuza member would be attacked N3, but one got attacked N2), you are roleblocked the next night. These roleblocks queue one after the other, so if you fail two wagers in one night, you'll be roleblocked for the next two nights.
- At night, you can use a charge of Destruction and target a player. That player receives an astral powerful rampage at their house that cleans all targets.

Post 4194
*Gamblers formed the basis of the Yakuza. Many Yakuza today still refer to themselves as bakuto, due to their primary interest in the gambling industry.*
